Question: This person continued his lucrative career in radio through to the 1950s, when radio's popularity was overshadowed by television.
Hints: This person moved to Hollywood when Paramount Pictures signed him for the 1938 film The Big Broadcast of 1938, also starring W C.
On July 27, 2003, two months after his 100th birthday, this person died at his home in Toluca Lake, Los Angeles.
This person worked as a butcher's assistant and a lineman in his teens and early twenties.
